list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a small area of still water, typically one formed naturally.
a supply of vehicles or goods available for use when needed.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the oldest vehicle in the motor pool
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: chiếc xe lâu đời nhất trong bể bơi động cơ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a form of billiards in which the object is to pocket all the balls with a cue ball. There are many versions of the game, e.g. straight pool or eight ball.
a group of contestants who compete against each other in a tournament for the right to advance to the next round.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Các cạnh trong hồ bơi a

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an arrangement, illegal in many countries, between competing parties to fix prices or rates and share business in order to eliminate competition.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: pool arrangements by the competing networks reduce individual costs
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Sắp xếp hồ bơi của các mạng cạnh tranh giảm chi phí cá nhân

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of water or another liquid) form a pool on the ground or another surface.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the oil pooled behind the quay walls, escaping slowly into the river
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Dầu gảy sau những bức tường Quay, trốn thoát từ từ xuống sông

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of two or more people or organizations) put (money or other assets) into a common fund.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: they entered a contract to pool any gains and invest them profitably
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Họ đã nhập một hợp đồng để mang lại bất kỳ lợi ích nào và đầu tư họ có lãi
